ORDER BY company_no DESC ) AS COMPANY , (Select @no:=0) AS no ) AS COMPANY WHERE rn between #{page.startIndex} AND #{page.endIndex}

SELECT company_no AS companyNo, company_kind AS companyKind, company_name AS companyName, zone_code AS zoneCode, address, detail_address AS detailAddress, company_tel AS companyTel, contents, open_time AS openTime, close_time AS closeTime, regist_date AS registDate, c.state, c.mng_no AS mngNo, mng.mng_name AS mngName FROM COMPANY AS c INNER JOIN MANAGER AS mng ON c.mng_no = mng.mng_no WHERE company_no = #{no}
